Our Story

About Us

We are a global community dedicated to empowering lives and building a sustainable future.

Our Mission

Empowering Communities
Transforming Lives

The Viaana Foundation was established with a singular vision: to create a world where opportunity is not a privilege but a right. We focus on the most vulnerable sections of society—children and women—providing them with the tools they need to break the cycle of poverty.

Through our targeted programs in education, healthcare, and vocational training, we have touched thousands of lives across the globe. We believe in sustainable development that fosters independence and dignity.

Why We Exist

Our Vision & Values

Our Vision

To enable a future where every individual has the agency to shape their own destiny, free from the constraints of poverty and inequality.

Our Mission

We drive change through education, healthcare, and empowerment, ensuring that no one is left behind in the march towards progress.

Our Values

Integrity, Compassion, and Transparency guide every action we take. We help with dignity and respect for all.

Bhawna Dudeja

Founder & CEO

Visionary Leadership

Driven by Purpose

"I truly believe that together, we can create a future where every child, no matter their background, has access to opportunities for a brighter tomorrow."

As a Chartered Accountant and IIM Ahmedabad alumna, I spent years navigating the corporate world. Yet, my heart always leaned towards a simple truth: talent is universal, but opportunity is not.

Viaana Foundation was born from a personal journey—seeing the life-changing power of education firsthand. What started as supporting one family has grown into a movement to provide holistic support, healthcare, and vocational training to the most vulnerable.

We are not just building a charity; we are building a launchpad for dreams.
